clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Effect of ACT-132577 on the Pharmacokinetics of Midazolam and 1-hydroxy Midazolam in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Two-treatment Study to Investigate the Effect of ACT-132577 at Steady State on the Pharmacokinetics of Midazolam and Its Metabolite 1-hydroxy Midazolam in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of ACT-132577 on the pharmacokinetics of midazolam and 1-hydroxy midazolam and to evaluate the safety and tolerability of ACT-132577 when administered alone and in combination with midazolam.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Midazolam PK sampling on Days 1, 2, 6 and 7
primary_outcome.description: Cmax of midazolam and 1-hydroxy midazolam following administration of midazolam alone and in combination with ACT-132577

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from zero to infinity (AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Midazolam PK sampling on Days 1, 2, 6 and 7
primary_outcome.description: AUC0-∞ of midazolam and 1-hydroxy midazolam following administration of midazolam alone and in combination with ACT-132577

primary_outcome.time_frame: Midazolam PK sampling on Days 1, 2, 6 and 7
primary_outcome.description: Tmax of midazolam and 1-hydroxy midazolam following administration of midazolam alone and in combination with ACT-132577

primary_outcome.time_frame: Midazolam PK sampling on Days 1, 2, 6 and 7
primary_outcome.description: T1/2 of midazolam and 1-hydroxy midazolam following administration of midazolam alone and in combination with ACT-132577

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 to Follow-up (for up to 38 days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening to Follow-up (for up to 59 days)

arm_group.description: Single dose of Midazolam 8 mg on Day 1
Single dose of ACT-132577 150 mg on Day 2; single dose of ACT-132577 50 mg on Day 3, Day 4, and Day 5.
Single dose of Midazolam 8 mg and single dose of ACT-132577 50 mg on Day 6

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signed informed consent in the local language prior to any study-mandated procedure
- Body mass index (BMI) of 18.0 to 30.0 kg/m2 (inclusive) at screening
- Healthy on the basis of medical history, physical examination, cardiovascular assessments and serology and laboratory tests
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any circumstances or conditions, which, in the opinion of the investigator, may affect full participation in the study or compliance with the protocol
